flawed_nl_solution:
The first athlete jumped a total of 60 feet because 26 + 30 + 7 = <<26+30+7=60>>60
The second athlete jumped a total of 66 feet because 24 + 34 + 8 = <<24+34+8=66>>66
The first athlete jumped 20 feet on average because 60 / 3 = <<60/3=20>>20
The second athlete jumped 22 feet on average because 66 / 3 = <<66/3=22>>22
The average jump of the winner was 22 feet because 22 > 20
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 60. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
